source_objects.title: Arts & Crafts
source_objects.description: From quilting to cake decorating, crafting inspiration to art instruction, welcome to the ultimate place for courses in arts & crafts.

items.title: QUICK START painting with watercolors, play & learn. PART 2

visible_instructors.name: Nicola A
visible_instructors.title: Nicola A Blakemore
visible_instructors.job_title: Professional Artist, Teacher and Creative Entrepreneur

items.headline: Just getting started with watercolors? Then let me help you along with subjects to speed up your progress easy & fun
objectives_summary: Students will learn about watercolour colour mixing.
Students will learn how to achieve some interesting effects with other materials and equipment. Students will learn about creating shadows and shading.
This course will help build painting confidence in watercolour paints.

items.title: How To RENDER Comics

visible_instructors.name: Ed
visible_instructors.title: Ed Foychuk
visible_instructors.job_title: Illustrator and Instructor at How To Draw Comics . net

items.headline: Drawing, and Inking, and Coloring, oh my!!
objectives_summary: How to render with pencil
How to render with ink
How to render with markers

items.title: Sketchbook Everyday: Painting Birds in Watercolor

visible_instructors.name: Mandar
visible_instructors.title: Mandar Marathe
visible_instructors.job_title: Fine Artist, Sculptor, Illustrator, and Engineer

items.headline: Drawing, value study and step by step painting instructions
objectives_summary: Learn to draw simplistically
Paint confidently with watercolors
Build a habit of everyday painting

items.title: Learn to sculpt with epoxy putty

visible_instructors.name: Francesca
visible_instructors.title: Francesca Dalla Benetta
visible_instructors.job_title: Escultora, Artista Plastica y Caracterizadora (Makeup FX)

items.headline: Learn to use epoxy putty for sculpture, crafts, costume jewelery, bas-reliefs and more creations!
objectives_summary: In the course we see different types of pieces and decoration. Adding your own imagination the student can make pieces of his own creation: three-dimensional pieces of variable size, jewelry, decorations, repairs etc

items.title: Beginner Resin and Alcohol Ink Fluid Art Abstract Golds
items.headline: Let's talk about GOLD's - Diptych Alcohol Ink Fluid Abstract painting and learn to finish it with coat of Resin to Seal.
objectives_summary: Alcohol ink painting basics.
How to create a beginner fluid abstract art piece.
Use 3 different types of gold pigments with your alcohol ink.

items.title: How To Draw Flowers Vol 1 - Roses, Tulips & Daffodils
items.headline: Learn to draw Roses, Tulips and Daffodils with Colin Bradley. Learn Pastel Pencil Techniques for your own pictures.
objectives_summary: How to use Pastel Pencil Techniques to Draw Flowers
Apply the light to dark rule when layering pastel tones
Be able to apply the techniques to their own pictures and flower drawings

items.title: LUXURY HANDMADE SOAPS  inc MAKING SOAPS with ALCOHOL
items.headline: Learn to make a variety of soaps including soaps made with 100% original Guinness.
objectives_summary: How to prepare and dry citrus to be used in soap-making.
How to prepare alcohol for use in soap-making.
How to make multi-coloured soaps.

items.title: TIG Welding Basics Part 1

visible_instructors.name: Desiree
visible_instructors.title: Desiree Rohrer
visible_instructors.job_title: CEO of Hangar44, the very first Garage Studio in Europe

items.headline: Learning TIG welding
objectives_summary: TIG welding basics

items.title: How to Paint a Castle in Watercolor & Pastel
items.headline: Learn How To Paint a Stunning Castle with Watercolor then Enhance the Picture using Pastel Pencils !
objectives_summary: Have a completed a Painting of Scotney Castle - a famous Castle in Kent, England
Apply new watercolor techniques to their own work
Understand building colours and layers with watercolor

items.title: WARLI Tribal Painting Ultimate Guide - A Folk Art of INDIA
items.headline: Warli Famous Folk art of India
objectives_summary: Warli painting general knowledge
Warli painting Materials
Warli painting Motives

items.title: Drawing For Painters

visible_instructors.name: Desiree Holmes
visible_instructors.title: Desiree Holmes Scherini
visible_instructors.job_title: Artist, Art Instructor, Life Coach and Author

items.headline: How to accurately draw what you see before you paint it.
objectives_summary: This course will give students the fundamentals necessary to draw what they see accurately, before they begin their painting.
The skills students will take away from this course are many that will make their artwork joyful, not stressful!
one and two point perspective

items.title: Less than 15 mins each to paint. Quicken up, gain CONFIDENCE

visible_instructors.name: Nicola A
visible_instructors.title: Nicola A Blakemore
visible_instructors.job_title: Professional Artist, Teacher and Creative Entrepreneur

items.headline: Easily make time to paint small, garden theme paintings. Stop overthinking, play, gain confidence & better techniques.
objectives_summary: Painting activity and a game for the whole family.
You will paint more quickly and avoid overthinking.
Students will be able to paint with more confidence.

items.title: How to Draw a Mermaid - Cartoon Drawing Animation Course
items.headline: Drawing for Beginners
objectives_summary: How to Draw a Mermaid
How to Draw
How to Draw Illustration

items.title: Manga Drawing Basic Course / Manuscript & Vertical Scrolling

visible_instructors.name: MANABI
visible_instructors.title: MANABI JOURNEY
visible_instructors.job_title: Education biz / 教材開発・出版事業

items.headline: How do you create your story and build your world to draw more attractive manga? [English Subtitles]
objectives_summary: You can learn Japanese Manga drawing skills and draw it.
You can obtain basic skills and post your manga on manga posting site.
You can complete the manuscript of your original manga and understand the important points when doing it.

items.title: How to Draw Cute Animals - Cartoon Drawing Animation Course
items.headline: Draw Cute Step by Step - The Easy Way
objectives_summary: How to Draw Cute Animals
How to Draw Cute
Learn to Draw

items.title: Jewelry Making Masterclass: Be(ad) Stunning!
items.headline: Master a 100-year-old artisan skill of handcrafting Croatian statement jewelry, even if you never made jewelry before!
objectives_summary: A unique skill of handcrafting a Croatian beaded statement necklace called Kraluš.
How you can design and craft your own variations of this exquisite artisan jewelry using FunBook of Patterns!
